class.name: EditorScript
class.brief_description: Base script that can be used to add extension functions to the editor.

method.name: _run
method.description: This method is executed by the Editor when [b]File > Run[/b] is used.

method.name: add_root_node
method.description: Makes [param node] root of the currently opened scene. Only works if the scene is empty. If the [param node] is a scene instance, an inheriting scene will be created.

method.name: get_editor_interface
method.deprecated: [EditorInterface] is a global singleton and can be accessed directly by its name.

method.name: get_scene
method.description: Returns the edited (current) scene's root [Node]. Equivalent of [method EditorInterface.get_edited_scene_root].
